quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Success is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
author: Beverly Sills

quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The secret of success is to do the common things uncommonly well.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
author: Anonymous

quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
author: Shiv Khera

quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Success is a journey, not a destination.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: If you want to be successful, prepare to be doubted and tested.
author: Anonymous

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.
author: Anonymous

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If people are doubting how far you can go, go so far that you can’t hear them anymore.
author: Michele Ruiz

quote: Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
author: Herman Melville

quote: Behind every successful person are a lot of unsuccessful years.
author: Bob Brown

quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
author: David Brinkley

quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving.
author: Conrad Hilton

quote: Do what you love and success will follow. Passion is the fuel behind a successful career.
author: Meg Whitman

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
author: George S. Patton

quote: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Success is 10% inspiration and 90% perspiration.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear—not absence of fear.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Patience, persistence, and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Success is simple. Do what's right, the right way, at the right time.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Some people dream of success, while others wake up and work hard at it.
author: Anonymous

quote: Success is about creating benefit for all and enjoying the process.
author: Jack Ma

quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: There is no elevator to success. You have to take the stairs.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: One secret of success is to refuse to let temporary setbacks defeat you.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Work like hell. I mean you just have to put in 80 to 100 hour weeks every week.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Success is best when it’s shared.
author: Howard Schultz

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Success comes from having dreams that are bigger than your fears.
author: Bobby Unser

quote: Forget about style; worry about results.
author: Bobby Orr

quote: It's not about money or connections—it's the willingness to outwork and outlearn everyone.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: If you do what you’ve always done, you’ll get what you’ve always gotten.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Success is dependent on effort.
author: Sophocles

quote: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.
author: Conan O'Brien

quote: Success isn't just about what you accomplish, it's about what you inspire others to do.
author: Anonymous

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire; the size of your dream; and how you handle disappointment along the way.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: I owe my success to having listened respectfully to the very best advice, and then going away and doing the exact opposite.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: Success is a science; if you have the conditions, you get the result.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I never dreamed about success, I worked for it.
author: Estée Lauder

quote: The secret of success is constancy to purpose.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Success is most often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
author: Bill Bradley

quote: To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Success is to be measured not by wealth, power, or status, but by the degree to which you're sharing your unique gifts with the world.
author: Steve Pavlina

quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Ninety percent of success is just showing up.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The foundation of success in life is good health: that is the substratum fortune; it is also the basis of happiness.
author: P.T. Barnum

quote: Success is my only option, failure's not.
author: Eminem

quote: Flame-like, the desire for success should burn within you.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The secret to success is to know something nobody else knows.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: Success is simply a matter of luck. Ask any failure.
author: Earl Wilson

quote: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Success is purely a matter of luck. I know this because I see it in everyone I don't like.
author: Jean Cocteau

quote: The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire, not things we fear.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and gets to bed at night, and in between he does what he wants to do.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: Success is falling nine times and getting up ten.
author: Jon Bon Jovi

quote: There is no failure except in no longer trying.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
author: Truman Capote

quote: Success is focus, and focus is saying 'no'.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: He has achieved success who has lived well, laughed often, and loved much.
author: Bessie Anderson Stanley

quote: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The road to success is always under construction.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everyone.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Success is steady progress toward one's personal goals.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Pray that your loneliness may spur you into finding something to live for, great enough to die for.
author: Dag Hammarskjöld

quote: To double your success rate, you must double your failure rate.
author: Thomas J. Watson

quote: Success is often the result of taking a misstep in the right direction.
author: Al Bernstein

quote: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The master has failed more times than the beginner has even tried.
author: Stephen McCranie

quote: Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above them.
author: Washington Irving

quote: The starting point of all achievement is desire.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less-than-excellent work.
author: Thomas J. Watson

quote: The secret to success is to start before you are ready.
author: Marie Forleo

quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Success is not a destination, it's a way of life.
author: Anonymous

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
author: Tim Notke

quote: Your current circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
author: Nido Qubein

quote: Success is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well.
author: Jim Rohn
